thread.section_title: Matboard and More Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Matboard and More | matboardandmore.com
thread.title: Katie Lewis
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by Katie Lewis

author: Katie Lewis
title: Katie Lewis
text:
So many good things about Matboard and More:
- I was able to chat with someone while making my purchase to be sure it was correct and they were knowledgeable about the product.
- They did a follow up call the next day
- The packaging was excellent and the delivery was fast
- The frame was perfect and to the exact size ordered
Couldn't be happier!
Katie
